It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Poké Ball active and there is a remaining supply in the Poké Ball selector. ==Details== A specialized Poké Ball to capture Pokémon with, it provides no increased catch rate bonus and catches Pokémon in 1.25s.
